docs.text: TaraxaMkDocs Welcome! For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Add Pages add .md files in docs edit mkdocs.yml as below site_name: MkLorum nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md
docs.title: Home
